Je jouais sur Steam Deck pour tester justement et c’est HORRIBLE !! En pleine partie, j’ai été obligé de quitter car soudainement, le jeu ne reconnaissait plus du tout la configuration manette du Deck et repassait automatiquement en configuration clavier/souris (très utile quand on est sur Steam Deck évidemment). Ce problème rend le jeu impossible à jouer sur Deck pour le moment.

Починав грати ще у 2018 році, тоді – це була досить непогана гра, як і зараз. Геймлпейно змін сильних досі не відчуваю. Коли гру зробили безкоштовною з жахливою монетизацією – я був засмучений близзардом. Але зараз за срібні монети можна купувати скіни,в цілому особисто мені цього вистачає і я забрав усі скіни, які не встиг до переходу на фрі овервотч. 

Пве - величезний мінус цієї гри, напевно, тільки любителям лора щось буде цікаво там. 

Будь ласка, додайте українську мову.

This game is dogshit, has been for few years now. Don't fall for Dev's promises cuz we had no content at all for years just to get a shitty version of what we were promised in the end.
Now they are trying to sell us 45-60 minutes worth of butchered PvE content for 15$, what a joke of a game.

what was once a great game is now a terrible mess that was ruined by greedy decision makers and incompetent devs

predatory monetization, lack of new content, false promises or balancing heroes by changing a billion things in a single patch (which will obviously never work) just scratch the surface of the iceberg of shittyness that lies within this game

OW1 had its issues but whether you liked the game or not, i think that everyone can agree that this is just a huge downgrade

I dont know if I should be angry or sad about the decline of this game. If there isnt any massive shift in blizzards policies and staff, this game will only become worse.

Dont bother with this game or its toxic community before making this review i got into argument with a retard defending blizard as a company and telling me that modded skyrim will never compare to For Honor combat, he was also telling me that blizzard is less greedy than ea, and Bethesda, Bethesda and ea may re release the same game over and over and over again but at least the have the decency respect their female employees and not be r@&*ists. Im not praising ea or Bethesda all Im saying is that they have standards. and the people who actualy enjoy this game are also stupid enough to think that overwatch is also a dating platform, and like i said i had the aregument with the one guy oh and if your reading this you know who you are. hears a link to a youtube video proving im right it may not be exact but i told you skyrim can compare to for honor https://youtu.be/FJIKQYL6IKU anywhay i apoligize to people reading this for all the skyrim for honor talk but you all get the point. IN CONCLUSION Overwatch 2 is a pile of trash, ea and bathesda may be greedy money makers but even greedy money makers have more standards than the perverts over at blizzard, and lastly to the guy who knows who they are they can go fuck themselfs and to the rest of you have a lovely day hears a link to paladins and tf2 ( https://store.steampowered.com/app/444090/Paladins/ https://store.steampowered.com/app/440/Team_Fortress_2/ )and if you have a problem with my formating screw you too.

《诗经·彼阳》
彼阳若至，初升东曦。
绯雾飒蔽，似幕绡绸。
彼阳篝碧，雾霂涧滁。
赤石冬溪，似玛瑙潭。
彼阳晚意，暖梦似乐。
寐游浮沐，若雉飞舞。
终有一天我的统治会走向终点，而你 将加冕为王 暴雪早就不是以前那个暴雪了

暴雪，是孤儿的
游戏，是免费的
对局，是5v5的
国服，是没有的
金币，是取消的
开箱，是没有的
画质，是闪瞎眼的
英雄，是lgbt的
技能，是取消控制的
地图，是实习生的
剧情，是不需要守望先锋的
进度，是三年没有英雄的
氪金，是赛季通行证的
tga，是过去的
考迪克，是户口本单页的
国服联赛皮肤，是拿不回来的
我杀你吗的暴雪，搞你妈5v5就像你的木琴给lgbt的尼格按在墙上轮奸中出一样，低能儿通行证，还有典藏版的小丑黑影，无时无刻不在提醒你的家人是想象出来的
2016年的tga年度最佳游戏现在就像你妈妈的死亡证明一样，暴雪和考迪克仿佛一出生就被遗弃到了弃婴桶里一样，可怜至极，owl联赛也是纯纯的小丑
总结：暴雪，是低能的。玩家，是愤怒的
